column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////My favorite place in eat
column2: drink and celebrate a special occasion in Chicago for the last year. THE BEST DRY AGED BONE IN RIBEYE I HAVE HAD in CHICAGO. Even though they are not  a "Classic Chicago steakhouse"  Same goes for their oysters not being a "Chicago Seafood Staple" I leave full happy
column3: satisfied and wanting to come back for more. Their fresh baked bread is so bomb. Bone marrow
column4: cocktails and ambiance is spot on. MUST TRY for locals and tourists.  Menu lets you share and spend little $$ or celebrate
column5: go all out and spend $$$$. All of their spot are great but this is my favorite so far. Keep doing what you doing!
